rationale: The documentation did not mention the patient's adherence to warfarin or the use of a pill organizer.
The patient's report of no noticeable changes after missing a dose of warfarin was not included.
The suggestion of setting phone alerts as a backup plan for medication adherence was omitted.
The involvement of the patient's daughter in managing medication adherence was not noted.
The patient's age and relevant medical history, such as atrial fibrillation and hyperlipidemia, were not documented.
The patient's allergy to penicillin was not documented.
